entry.title: (Sticky) Meta Information
entry.summary: Lists some meta information related to the blog itself for easy reference.

entry.title: Number guessing game
entry.summary: It was a free day again, so I dug out the number guessing game code that I wrote during the high school. I didn't improve it, but combined the popular online version with elementary school mathematics to form the following code.

entry.title: The 1st blog
entry.summary:
First meeting

Hello, classmate! Welcome to the blogging system based on the Next theme built with Hexo.

About Markdown

By the time you're able to access this page, you're already aware that blog posts will be written using Markdown s
